original_text: This is what I, the Teacher, have learned. I studied everything very carefully. I wanted to know the reason why things happen. This is what I, the Teacher, have learned. I studied everything very carefully. I wanted to know the reason why things happen. This is what I, the Teacher, have learned. I studied everything very carefully. I wanted to know the reason why things happen. This is what I, the Teacher, have learned. I studied everything very carefully. I wanted to know the reason why things happen. This is what I, the Teacher, have learned.
korean_text: 전도자가 이르되 보라 내가 낱낱이 살펴 그 이치를 연구하여 이것을 깨달았노라

sentences.original_text: This is what I, the Teacher, have learned.

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 것을 매우 주의 깊게 연구했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I wanted to know the reason why things happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 일어나는 일들의 이유를 알고 싶었습니다.
